sentence.Network_en: A few minutes later the bomb went off, destroying the vehicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 炸弹几分钟后爆炸，炸毁了那辆车。

sentence.Network_en: The prisoners went on the rampage destroying everything in their way.
sentence.Network_cn: 囚犯撒野闹事，砸毁了所有挡路的东西。

sentence.Network_en: They can't destroy truth without destroying each and every one of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非他们将我们赶尽杀绝，否则真理不灭。

PerfectNetExp.abs: for instance , if we employ two , three or four mechanized divisions against one mechanized enemy division , we can be all the more certain of destroying it .例如我用两个或三个或四个机械化的师对敌一个机械化的师，更能确定地消灭这个师

it is also the time for destroying the enemy's communication lines on a large scale , hampering his transport and giving direct support to the regular forces in their campaigns .大规模地破坏敌之交通线，妨碍敌之运输，直接帮助正规军的战役作战，也在这个时候。

Quetta , Pakistan ( AFP ) -A powerful earthquake in southwest Pakistan killed at least 160 people early Wednesday , destroying mud homes and sending survivors screaming into the streets in panic .在周三早上，发生在巴基斯坦西南方向的一个强烈地震使得至少160人死亡。它摧毁了泥质房屋，幸存者们尖叫着涌入街道，十分恐
China tested an anti-satellite missile by destroying one of its weather satellites .中国通过摧毁他的一个气象卫星试验一种反卫星导弹。

list.abs: 八年级下册英语词组_百度知道 ... in turn 依次 be destroyed 被损坏 not…until 直到…才.
fire intended to neutralize or destroy enemy weapons ., 意在压制或摧毁敌人武器的射击.
...膏菌属鹅膏菌节的模式，这个节包含所有早就鉴定出来的剧毒性鹅膏菌属物种。在这些物种中最著名的是被称作“毁灭天使”的鳞柄白鹅膏、死亡天使和白毒伞。“毁灭天使”（destroying angel）这个名称死亡帽有时也会被应用到毒鹅膏上，但是“死帽蕈”（death cap）早就成为英文中最常用的俗.
圣光术(destroy undead),3级,15点,战斗,基础:冲击不死系有生命的物质,伤害为英雄魔法力×10 10。高级:冲击不死系有生命的物质,伤害 …

entry.def: To destroy something means to cause so much damage to it that it is completely ruined or does not exist any more.

example.ex: That's a sure recipe for destroying the economy and creating chaos...
example.tran: 那样做肯定会破坏经济、制造混乱。

example.ex: No one was injured in the explosion, but the building was completely destroyed...
example.tran: 没有人在爆炸中受伤，但大楼遭到了彻底毁坏。

entry.def: To destroy someone means to ruin their life or to make their situation impossible to bear.

example.ex: If I was younger or more naive, the criticism would have destroyed me.
example.tran: 如果我再年轻一些，或是再单纯一些，那些批评可能就会把我给毁了。

entry.tran: 杀死，消灭（生病或具危险性的动物）
entry.def: If an animal is destroyed, it is killed, either because it is ill or because it is dangerous.

example.ex: Lindsay was unhurt but the horse had to be destroyed.
example.tran: 林赛没有受伤，但那匹马却不得不被人道毁灭。

Sentence.sentence: And it would take an average of 65 years for the reduced carbon emissions from a new energy-efficient home to make up for the resources lost by destroying an old one.
Understand what she's trying to accomplish and propose a Plan B that will make it happen without destroying what you've done so far.
